import React from 'react' const Rating = ({ value, text }) => { return (
= 1 ?'fa fa-star' : value >= 0.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-star-o'} > = 2 ?'fa fa-star' : value >= 1.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-star-o'} > = 3 ?'fa fa-star' : value >= 2.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-star-o'} > = 4 ?'fa fa-star' : value >= 3.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-star-o'} > = 1 ?'fa fa-star' : value >= 0.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-star-o'} > {text && text} {/* if text ? text : '' */}
) } export default Rating
